definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: Battelle asks if Yahoo is talking to Microsoft about any kind of deal.
sentences.chinese: 伯特立問雅虎是否在跟微軟商討某項交易。

sentences.english: Floyd discuss with local construction consultant for project details.
sentences.chinese: 與當地工程顧問商討建築細節。

sentences.english: I deliberated with her on her future plans of work.
sentences.chinese: 我和她一起商討她將來的工作計劃。

sentences.english: He summoned the gods to council.
Welcome letter calls to discuss the export wholesale and retail business.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來函來電商討出口批發和零售業務。

sentences.english: I had consult my father (a professional tourism marketer and absolute authority in the industry around Yangtze river country) and my intelligence in Nanking for several times.
sentences.chinese: 我與家父和我在南京的情報人員進行了多次商討諮詢。

sentences.english: The junior and senior of the senate all have driver's licenses.
sentences.chinese: 商討院的年父老以及幼年者都有駕駛執照。

sentences.english: They were deliberating over the plan.
sentences.chinese: 他們在仔細商討此計劃。

sentences.english: The professors are deliberating over the post graduates dissertations.
sentences.chinese: 教授們正在商討研究生的論文。

sentences.english: The Middle East requires more open debate and the dropping of taboos.
sentences.chinese: 中東要求更公開的商討和結束禁制。

sentences.english: The president advised with the cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 總統同內閣進行了商討。

sentences.english: Parliamentarians in the parliament discussed about problem of abortion.
sentences.chinese: 國會議員在國會商討了墮胎的問題。

sentences.english: Then the court adjourns to deliberate onwhether any witnesses should be heard.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，法庭休庭，商討是否應該提請任何證人作證。
讓我們商討一下這個問題。

sentences.english: Both sides also discussed taking the post of propagandizes ambassador the incident.
sentences.chinese: 雙方還商討了出任宣傳大使一事。

sentences.english: Or the Korea-Japan Friendship Tunnel – the fine details are still being discussed.
sentences.chinese: 目前這項工程的具體細節仍在商討中。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
